price: 32. Dat is Allah, jullie Heer in de waarheid. Wat kan er dan na de waarheid nog zijn, behalve valsheid? Hoe kunnen jullie je dan alsnog afwenden?
arabic: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: fadhālikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-ḥaqu famādhā baʿda al-ḥaqi illā al-ḍalālu fa-annā tuṣ'rafūna
